articles.title: API Design Principles
articles.content: Learn the fundamental principles of good API design, including consistency, simplicity, and developer experience.

comments.author: Senior Developer
comments.text: These principles are essential for any API project.

articles.title: Async API Patterns
articles.content: Asynchronous APIs enable better scalability and user experience. Explore patterns like polling, webhooks, and server-sent events.

articles.title: API Contract Testing
articles.content: Contract testing ensures compatibility between API providers and consumers. Learn about Pact and other contract testing tools.

articles.title: API Performance Optimization
articles.content: Optimize your API's performance through database query optimization, connection pooling, and efficient serialization.

articles.title: Building Resilient APIs
articles.content: Design APIs that gracefully handle failures through retries, circuit breakers, and fallback mechanisms.

comments.author: Reliability Engineer
comments.text: Resilience patterns are critical for production systems.
